title: With just a little trust
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Family - Social aspects
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Social problems
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Women - Social conditions
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Mothers and daughters
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Social problems in motion pictures
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/African Americans
description: An elderly black woman, her feet swollen with arthritis, marches with pride and determination through an urban ghetto to meet her daughter. Arriving ahead of her daughter, she finds an eviction notice on the door of the apartment - only the beginning of a veritable sea of troubles which mother and daughter meet together. Cast: Frances Williams, Barbara Iley.
